title: Liam Hemsworth Goes On Date With Mystery Woman
text:
Well it looks like our chances of a Liam Hemsworth Bachelor have gone from slim to non-existent because he’s been spotted on a romantic dinner date with a *mystery woman* according to TMZ.

Liam was photographed with his mystery lady in New York’s West Village on Thursday looking handsome as ever.

This is the first time Liam has been documented on a date since Miley. It likely isn’t his first date, but the man keeps a pretty low profile so this is the first time he’s been papped with a lady friend.

After weeks of hiding out back home in Byron Bay with brother Chris and his family, the 29-year-old actor has popped up in NYC holding hands with a new girl.

While Miley’s type is famous Aussies, it’s clear that Liam’s a pretty big fan of drop-dead gorgeous blonde bombshells.

According to the sleuths in the After Work Drinks Podcast’s closed Facebook group, the mystery girl appears to be fellow Aussie Maddison Brown. Maddison is a model and actress, most famous for her work in The Kettering Incident and Dynasty.

Although it’s not confirmed, the mystery girl sure does look a lot like Maddison.

Hemsworth and maybe Maddison shared some laughs over a meal and some cheeky bevvies at Sant Ambroeus, then went for a cute stroll around the city, which is pretty daring when you’ve got TMZ on your back.

Unlike Miley, who has been very public with her new whatever-the-fuck-is-going-on-with-Cody-Simpsonship, Liam prefers to keep it a little more low key.

It’s been a wild ride since Miley and Liam (aka our favourite teenage couple) called it quits back in August. We’ve seen Miley and Kaitlynn, then they called it quits. Now we’re seeing Miley and Cody Simpson, but this is the first time we’re seeing Liam with a new lady friend. So what does it mean? I MUST KNOW.

It was just a few days ago that sources told Cosmopolitan that Liam is open to meeting new people, so maybe there will be no need for a Hemsworth Bachie season.

We couldn’t afford to hire our own personal paparazzi to follow Liam’s every move, but apparently TMZ can, so you can check out the pics here.
description: Aussie hunk and Miley Cyrus' ex-husband Liam Hemsworth has been spotted on a date with a mystery woman & fans have their guesses as to who it is.
